radiographic_examinations.findings: Hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. Smooth contour of liver, no focal liver mass. Main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. No ascites. No intrahepatic biliary dilation; CHD measures 5 mm. Cholelithiasis without gallbladder wall thickening. Pancreas appears within normal limits, without masses or pancreatic ductal dilation. Spleen normal echogenicity, measuring 10.1 cm. Limited views of right kidney show no hydronephrosis. Visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
